description: Request for a preview of an upload to a Table.

tableId.description: This is an optional parameter.  If provided the current schema of the table will be evaluated and compared to the headers in the CSV.

uploadFileHandleId.description: The ID of the file handle for a type of UPLOAD

linesToSkip.description: The number of lines to skip from the start of the file.  The default value of 0 will be used if this is not provided by the caller.
